
<h1> &#50836;&#44552; </h1><br/>
&#49352;&#47196;&#50868; &#50836;&#44552;&#51012; &#52628;&#44032;&#54616;&#47140;&#47732;, &#45804;&#47141; &#50500;&#51060;&#53080;&#51012; &#53364;&#47533;&#54632;&#51004;&#47196;&#50024; &#44536; &#50836;&#44552;&#51060; &#49373;&#49457;&#46108; &#45216;&#51676;&#50752; &#49884;&#44036;&#51012; &#49440;&#53469;&#54616;&#49901;&#49884;&#50724;. &#44536;&#47532;&#44256;&#45208;&#49436; &#54400;&#45796;&#50868; &#47700;&#45684;&#50640;&#49436; &#50836;&#44552;&#51060; &#52397;&#44396;&#46108; &#54637;&#47785;&#51012; &#49440;&#53469;&#54616;&#49901;&#49884;&#50724;. &#54364;&#51456; &#50836;&#44552;, &#49436;&#48708;&#49828; &#50836;&#44552; &#44536;&#47532;&#44256; &#49464;&#44552;&#51012; &#52628;&#44032;&#54616;&#49901;&#49884;&#50724;.
<br/>
&#47564;&#50557; &#53945;&#48324; &#49464;&#51068;&#51060; &#51201;&#50857;&#46104;&#50632;&#45796;&#47732;, &#51060;&#45716; &#51088;&#46041;&#51004;&#47196; &#50836;&#44552; &#53076;&#46300;&#50640; &#51201;&#50857;&#46112; &#44163;&#51077;&#45768;&#45796;. &#51201;&#50857; &#44032;&#45733;&#54620; &#50836;&#44552;&#51012; &#49440;&#53469;&#54616;&#49901;&#49884;&#50724;.
<br/>
&#52397;&#44396; &#54637;&#47785;&#51008; &#54620; &#48264; &#52628;&#44032;&#46104;&#47732; &#49325;&#51228;&#54624; &#49688; &#50630;&#49845;&#45768;&#45796;. &#44536;&#47084;&#45208; &#51060;&#45716; &#52397;&#44396;&#49436;&#50640;&#49436; &#47924;&#54952;&#54868;&#46112; &#49688;&#45716; &#51080;&#49845;&#45768;&#45796;. &#50812;&#54200;&#50640; &#51080;&#45716; &#55092;&#51648;&#53685;&#51012; &#49440;&#53469;&#54616;&#47732; &#52397;&#44396;&#49436;&#44032; &#47924;&#54952; &#52376;&#47532;&#46112; &#44163;&#51077;&#45768;&#45796;. &#8220;&#50976;&#54952;&#54868;&#54616;&#44592;&#8221; &#50741;&#49496;&#51060; &#50630;&#51004;&#48064;&#47196;, &#49892;&#49688;&#47196; &#54637;&#47785;&#51012; &#47924;&#54952;&#54868;&#54620; &#44221;&#50864;, &#51060;&#45716; &#49688;&#46041;&#51201;&#51004;&#47196; &#51116;&#51077;&#47141;&#46104;&#50612;&#50556; &#54633;&#45768;&#45796;.
<br/>
If the charged amount, service fee and tax are left blank, these will automatically be populated from the standard rates using the promotional rate codes being applied. 
<br/>
If there is no promotional rate code selected the standard amount, service fee and tax will be directly copied across.
<br/>
To override the calculated amount, simply fill in the charged amount, service fee and tax.
<br/>
<br/>
<h1>&#51648;&#48520;&#44552; &#48155;&#44592;</h1><br/>
&#51648;&#48520;&#44552;&#51012; &#48155;&#45716; &#44163;&#51008; &#50836;&#44552;&#51012; &#52628;&#44032;&#54616;&#45716; &#44163;&#44284; &#44144;&#51032; &#55137;&#49324;&#54616;&#50668;, &#44036;&#45800;&#55176; &#51648;&#48520; &#45216;&#51676;&#47484; &#52628;&#44032;&#54616;&#44592;&#47564; &#54616;&#47732; &#46121;&#45768;&#45796;. 
<br/>
<b>&#48120;&#51648;&#48520; &#44552;&#50529;&#51060;</b> 0&#51060;&#46972;&#47732;, <b>&#50629;&#45936;&#51060;&#53944;</b> &#48260;&#53948;&#51012; &#45796;&#49884; &#45580;&#47084; &#52397;&#44396;&#49436;&#47484; &#44081;&#49888;&#54633;&#45768;&#45796;. &#47564;&#50557; &#51648;&#48520;&#51060; &#47924;&#54952;&#54868;&#46104;&#44256; &#48120;&#51648;&#48520; &#44552;&#50529;&#51060; 0&#51060; &#50500;&#45768;&#46972;&#47732;, &#52397;&#44396;&#49436; &#49345;&#53468;&#45716; &#50676;&#47140;&#51080;&#45716; &#49345;&#53468;&#47196; &#48148;&#45076; &#44163;&#51077;&#45768;&#45796;.
<br/>
